nodes.text: Sy Bisti was a trade language used in the Outer Rim. The Chiss knew this language prior to their first contact with citizens of the Galactic Republic. It was also spoken by the Lugubraa.

Sy Bisti made its first and only appearance in the novel Outbound Flight, which was written by Timothy Zahn. It was later referenced in the Rebellion Era Campaign Guide, where its name was misspelled as "Sy Bysti".
